TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DatePicker extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 表示可讓使用者選取日期的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that allows the user to select a date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可讓使用者選取日期，可能輸入到文字欄位，或使用下拉式清單控制項。The control allows the user to select a date by either typing it into a text field or by using a drop-down control. 許多控制項的屬性是用於管理內建的，以及相同 function 中的相等屬性。Many of a control's properties are for managing its built-in , and function identically to the equivalent property in . 特別是， ， ， ， ， ， ，和屬性函式和其對應項目。In particular, the , , , , , , and properties function identically to their counterparts. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 使用者可以直接在文字欄位中，設定輸入日期屬性。Users can type a date directly into a text field, which sets the property. 如果無法將輸入的字串轉換成有效的日期，會引發事件。If the cannot convert the entered string to a valid date, the event will be raised. 根據預設，這會導致例外狀況，但事件處理常式可以設定屬性`false`並防止所引發的例外狀況。By default, this causes an exception, but an event handler for can set the property to `false` and prevent an exception from being raised. > [!NOTE] > 支援西曆日曆。The supports only the Gregorian calendar. ## 自訂日期選擇器控制項Customizing the DatePicker Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[日期選擇器 Syles 和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/datepicker-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [DatePicker Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/datepicker-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下圖顯示。The following illustration shows a . ![DatePicker 控制項](~/add/media/ndp-datepicker.png "DatePicker 控制項")![DatePicker control](~/add/media/ndp-datepicker.png "DatePicker control") 日期選擇器控制項DatePicker Control 下列範例會建立上圖所示。The following example creates the shown in the previous illustration. 會進行下列作業：The does the following: - 顯示使用的週和月份名稱的不縮寫的天的日期。Displays the date using unabbreviated days of the week and month names. - 限制在 2009 年中只顯示日期的下拉式行事曆。Limits the drop-down calendar to display dates only in the year 2009. - 顯示星期一做為一週的第一天。Displays Monday as the first day of the week. [!code-csharp[DatePickerSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DatePickerSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[DatePickerSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlackoutDates As CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection

summary.span: 取得或設定標記為無法選取的日期集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.
A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
The default value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合中的日期會出現為下拉式行事曆上停用。Dates in this collection will appear as disabled on the drop-down calendar. 如果使用者輸入的日期，不能選取，就會發生事件。If the user types a date that is not selectable, the event occurs. 若要讓所有過去的日期不能選取，您可以使用這個屬性所傳回的集合所提供的方法。To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the method provided by the collection returned by this property. 將加入此集合的日期，則已被選取時，或加入所指定的範圍外的日期和會導致。Adding a date to this collection when it is already selected or adding a date outside the range specified by and will cause an . ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges**oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* 一或多個物件項目類型的。One or more object elements of type . ## Examples 下列範例會建立，會顯示在 2009 年 8 月中的日期，並指定每個星期六和星期日不能選取。The following example creates a that displays the dates in August 2009 and specifies that each Saturday and Sunday is not selectable. [!code-csharp[DatePickerSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DatePickerSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[DatePickerSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#2)] 控點事件，如下列程式碼所示。The handles the event, as shown in the following code. 如果使用者輸入不是可選取的日期，則這個範例會顯示一則訊息。If the user enters a date that is not selectable, the example displays a message. 如果使用者輸入不是有效的日期的文字，則會擲回例外狀況。If the user enters text that is not a valid date, an exception is thrown. [!code-csharp[DatePickerSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DatePickerSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![日期不是可選取的 DatePicker](~/add/media/ndp-datepickblackout.png "日期無法選取的 DatePicker")![DatePicker with dates that are not selectable](~/add/media/ndp-datepickblackout.png "DatePicker with dates that are not selectable") 其日期無法選取的 DatePickerDatePicker with dates that are not selectable

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Style ^ CalendarStyle { System::Windows::Style ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Style ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定當呈現日曆時所使用的樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the calendar.

value.span: 當呈現日曆時所使用的樣式。

span.span: The style that is used when rendering the calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性可指定下拉式月曆的外觀。Use the property to specify the appearance of the drop-down calendar. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourceExtension**resourceExtension* 下列其中之一：`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information, see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *styleResourceKey**styleResourceKey* 識別所要求的範本的索引鍵。The key that identifies the template being requested. 索引鍵參考中現有的資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . ## Examples 下列範例會建立如，並將指派的樣式屬性。The following example creates a for and assigns the style to the property. [!code-xaml[DatePickerSnippets#6](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#6)]

summary.span: 在 設為無法解譯為日期的值或是無法選取日期時發生。

span.span: Occurs when is set to a value that cannot be interpreted as a date or when the date cannot be selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後事件發生時，如果您設定屬性`true`，引發下列例外狀況的其中一個：After the event occurs, if you set the property to `true`, one of the following exceptions is raised: |例外狀況類型Exception type|條件Condition| |--------------------|---------------| ||輸入的文字無法剖析為有效的日期，並不會隱藏例外狀況。The text entered cannot be parsed to a valid date, and the exception is not suppressed.| ||輸入的文字會剖析為不是可選取的日期。The text entered parses to a date that is not selectable.| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立，會顯示在 2009 年 8 月中的日期，並指定每個星期六和星期日不能選取。The following example creates a that displays the dates in August 2009 and specifies that each Saturday and Sunday is not selectable. [!code-csharp[DatePickerSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DatePickerSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[DatePickerSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#2)] 控點事件，如下列程式碼所示。The handles the event, as shown in the following code. 如果使用者輸入不是可選取的日期，則這個範例會顯示一則訊息。If the user enters a date that is not selectable, the example displays a message. 如果使用者輸入不是有效的日期的文字，則會擲回例外狀況。If the user enters text that is not a valid date, an exception is thrown. [!code-csharp[DatePickerSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DatePickerSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime DisplayDate { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示的日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the date to display.
The date to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會影響的。This property affects the of the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| 這個屬性可讓開發人員指定的日期時要顯示是`null`。This property allows the developer to specify a date to display if is `null`. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立也就是以開啟其行事曆初始化及顯示 2009 年 7 月 7 日。The following example creates a that is initialized with its calendar open and displaying July 7, 2009. [!code-xaml[DatePickerSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#4)]

summary.span: 取得或設定目前選取的日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently selected date.
The date currently selected.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會影響的。This property affects the of the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有 2009 年 8 月 10 日選取的日期。The following example creates a that has the date August 10, 2009 selected. 此範例也會將繫結屬性。The example also binds the property to a . MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得 所顯示的文字，或設定選取的日期。

span.span: Gets the text that is displayed by the , or sets the selected date.
The text displayed by the .
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以設定的透過其文字方塊中輸入日期。A user can set the of a by typing a date into its text box. 嘗試剖析為日期的這個屬性中輸入任何字串。The attempts to parse any string entered into this property as a date. 雖然屬性可以設定為任何可剖析的字串方法日期的格式字串所傳回的值而定的屬性。While the property can be set to any string that can be parsed by the method date, the format of the string that is returned depends on the value of the property. 這表示可能會顯示不同使用者的輸入字串。This means that the might display a string that is different than what the user typed. 如果會設定為可選取且有效，日期就會發生事件。If is set to a date that is selectable and valid, the event occurs. 如果您處理事件以及組屬性`true`、或，就會引發。If you handle the event and set the property to `true`, a or is raised. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 **，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有 2009 年 8 月 10 日選取的日期。The following example creates a that has the date August 10, 2009 selected. 此範例也會將繫結屬性。The example also binds the property to a . 因為屬性設定為、和顯示日期使用縮寫的工作日和月份名稱，即使使用者輸入日期的簡短形式。Because the property is set to , the and displays the date using unabbreviated days of the week and month names even if the user enters a short form of a date. [!code-xaml[DatePickerSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datepickersnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#5)]
